attributes.action: award a Knighthood to Humphrey Lyttelton.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Humphrey Lyttleton's work over many many years in the fields of Jazz, Comedy and Radio has brought total joy to the lives of millions, unfortunately he is not very rich so this is the only way he may achieve an honour he richly deserves..

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "award a Knighthood to Humphrey Lyttelton."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17893


Prime Minister's Office
